quests.title: Blueberry Pluckin'
quests.description: Pick a couple of pints of blueberries for some fresh jam!
steps: Go to the your nearest blueberry pickin spot, take a photo with friends
Take a picture of your bucket of blueberries
Take selfie with LestersFarm clerk & Jam

quests.title: Clean St.John's!
quests.description: Fill a trash bag and return it to the recycling plant
steps: Go to the your nearest park or just around your community with trash bags
Pick up enough trash to fill bag
Take a selfie with you and the trash bag

quests.title: Catch me a Trout
quests.description: I hurt me had n needs someone ta get me a fish by
steps: Drop by 37. newfie dr. to get the fishing gear
I usually go to this lake, take pic of it when you get there
Store fish in cooler with ice keep it alive pls

quests.title: Take Care of Repto
quests.description: I need somebody to take care of my lil buddy
steps: You have to have experience with bearded dragons
Answer this question: How many eyes do bearded dragons have?
You will have to take care of him for 12 days

quests.title: Ant Exterminator
quests.description: Get rid of the ants in my yard
steps: Go to my address at address
Knock on side door
Exterminate

quests.title: McBooger Burger
quests.description: Try McDonald's newest burger!
steps: Go to your nearest participating McDickies
Show the employee this quest
Buy McBoogar

quests.title: Tylers Stuck
quests.description: Help Free Tyler
steps: Bend over and spell out run 5 times
stand back up and pat yourself on the back
open the washer

quests.title: Name Here I Guess
quests.description: I need to come up with a quest but I can't think of anything
steps: Come up with an idea for a quest
Submit it to me

quests.title: Babysit Rover
quests.description: I need someone to care for my dog while I'm on vacation
steps: Pick up Rover from me
Take care of him, keep him safe and happy
Give Rover back when I come home

quests.title: Flower Waterer
quests.description: Water My Flowers
steps: Get some water
Pour it on the flowers
Sprinkle fertalizer

quests.title: Save Ukraine
quests.description: Slava Ukraini!
steps: Get on a plane to Ukraine
Claim Slava Ukraini on entry
Train to save

quests.title: Try Food Delivery
quests.description: Want to try food delivery without ties?
steps: Download FoodZip
Type your NLQUEST username
Get matched to deliver quick

quests.title: Go To A Concert
quests.description: I've been cheated on but have another ticket, paying for friends
steps: Tell me why you should go to the concert
What is your favorite bands
Bring your own drugs

quests.title: Help Move Junk
quests.description: I'm trying to clear this place, help me move this
steps: I'm located at #########
First person to get here and help gets rewarded
Optionally help me with other stuff

quests.title: Headlight Repair
quests.description: I can't fix this on my own
steps: Not sure what you'll need but you'll need somethin
The car is located at 12 fixmycar way.
When you fix knock on the door of the yellow house #12

quests.title: Restore Property
quests.description: I need help restoring the land around this propert
steps: Get your stuff ready
Call me
Drive to location and mow

quests.title: Hobo Hero
quests.description: Bring homeless to the shelter
steps: Find homeless
Don't collect them, theyre people too
Bring to, to shelter at this place #####

quests.title: Roofing
quests.description: We need a roofer for a couple of days, no experience needed
steps: Get a hammer if you dont have one
Box of nails too

quests.title: Car Washing
quests.description: We need help at the car wash
steps: You're gonna get wet
Dress accordingly

quests.title: Mouse Problem
quests.description: My garden is overrun with mice!!
steps: Just come by and start killin
When you have one show me
Ill pay you $25 per mouse

quests.title: Plant for me
quests.description: I bought a bunch of plants, and have no skill to plant them
steps: I bought no fertalizer, youll need that
I also have no gardening tools so get those too
Plant my succulents
